location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 2 of 1823 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Gulf of Persia, aboard the HC Cruizer Auroraat Muscat to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter reports on the Resident's investigation at Muscat into an act of piracy; it concluded that it was carried out by a tribe not subject to the Imam of Muscat's direct control.
